name: Cosmic Corp. LLC
description:
Become a minimum-wage space slave worker! 

Manage the ever-expanding control of your universe all in the comfort of a 9-5 workday! Your goal is to get as many planets satisfied as possible before the end of the day. Meeting the needs of planets will grant Satisfaction Points, which are a vital attribute to making sure we know how great of a job you're doing! Keep doing good work, and we may give you control of more planets with little-to-no added benefits!

Specially designed Planetary Operating System! 

The POS has made it incredibly simple to meet the needs of any planet under your control. Just drag-and-drop a modifier into the planet, and the software will do the rest for you! Just make sure to only use the Company Provided Modifiers to make sure that nothing goes wrong!

Top of the Line Antivirus and Security! 

Due to recent issues regarding malware and malicious software being installed on company computers, a top-of-the-line AntiVirus program has been installed on each and every computer. This is to ensure that employees can safely use the POS without any fear of not being productive! We still advise employees to not use the Internet Browser or access any web-based content; That would stop productivity, and we can't have that here at Cosmic Corp LLC!

Controls:

Mouse - Desktop Interaction

Keyboard  - Typing

Any use of un-approved modifiers or software is not permitted under Section B-18 of your contract. If discovered will result in immediate termination from the company.
